mapper.select: select calendar.calendar_seq, calendar.board_seq, to_char(calendar.calendar_day, 'yyyy-mm-dd') calendar_day, (select count(*) from board where to_char(board.board_reg_day,'yymmdd') = to_char(calendar.calendar_day,'yymmdd')) as count from calendar

select * from (select ROWNUM rn, B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_LIKE from MEMBER M right join BOARD B on M.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ where TO_char(B.BOARD_REG_DAY, 'YYMMDD') = #{date} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC) where rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
select count(*) FROM board where TO_char(BOARD_REG_DAY, 'YYMMDD') = #{date}
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(calendar_seq, board_seq, calendar_day) values(c_seq.nextval, #{currentSeq}, sysdate)
